status_idle: Idle - Click button to start scanning
no_devices:
No devices found yet
Click the button above to start scanning
help_discovery_desc: Automatically detects Ubiquiti, Mikrotik, and Mimosa devices on your network by listening to UDP ports 10001 and 5678 for device broadcasts.
help_latency_desc: Measures network latency by pinging each device. Green (<10ms) is excellent, yellow (<50ms) is good, orange (<100ms) is fair, red (>100ms or offline) indicates poor connection.
help_oui_desc: Identifies the device manufacturer from the first 6 characters of the MAC address. Used when the discovery protocol doesn't provide vendor information.
help_network_map_desc: Displays discovered devices in a visual topology map. Click on devices to view their details.
help_manage_desc: Opens the device's web interface in your default browser for configuration.
help_admin_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: Run as Administrator for packet capture to work.
about_desc: Professional network device discovery tool for ISPs. Supports Ubiquiti, Mikrotik, and Mimosa devices.
